saao/saa15/P334377
a-na LUGAL EN-ia ARAD-ka {1}{d}15-du-ri lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia₂ {LU₂}hu-ub-tu₂ ša {1}gu-hu-ru {LU₂}qur-bu-te i-si-šu₂-nu pa-qid-u-ni a-na {URU}BAD₃-{1}MAN-GIN il-la-ku-ni UD x-KAM x x x x x x x-u-ni x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x-na x x x x x x x x-ka x x x x x x x x x x-lu x x x x x x x-bit x x x x x x x-lak x x x x x x {LU₂}hu-ub-tu₂ x x x x x x x x+x x x x x+x ina ŠA₃ x x x x x x x i-dan o x x a-na-ku a-ki an-ni-i ina UGU {LU₂}qur-bu-te ša i-si-šu₂-nu a-sap-ra nu-uk ina {URU}ba-qar-ri bi-la-šu₂-nu ina ŠA₃-bi lu šu₂-nu NINDA-MEŠ A-MEŠ di-na-šu₂-nu u₃ ina E₂.GAL ṭe₃-en-šu₂-nu šu-pur nu-uk mi-i-nu ša TA@v E₂.GAL i-šap-par-u-ni-ka-ni ina pi-it-te te-pa-aš₂
